room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Lake Elsinore in Temecula
review: Had a seriously great night here with my friends! I'd definitely recommend this place. Everything was well decorated which made the atmosphere perfect. We chose the Mansion Murder room and managed to solve the puzzle! However, we wouldn't have been able to do that without Chris and Rayleen, the wonderful people who helped us along the way. Our game master Chris was seriously the best! The clues he gave us and words of encouragement made finding the solution that much more rewarding. I had a lot of fun and I look forward to coming back next time for a different room!

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Lake Elsinore in Temecula
review: Inside is very nicely decorated! Was very impressed when we got there. The lobby is very comfortable, thwre is a table full puzzles and there is a huge bar and additional tables as well. We did Mansion Murder for my daughter's birthday. I waited in the lobby for the full hour and was very comfortable. The girls didnt make it out but had a ton of fun. Definitely will go back!

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Lake Elsinore in Temecula
review: We went here with a group of six and did Mansion Murder! AMAZING!!!!! Shout out to Rayleen and Chris for helping us out throughout the escape room!! Super fun and challenging and they made sure we had enough clues and time for us to finish it!!!! Definitely going back here with friends and the family!!!!
